author: mtosi
body:
exploiting the code developed by @hatakeyamak  (thanks !!)
this PR adds the corresponding DQM and VALIDATION modules to the HLT senquences

some updates had to be made in order to check the availability of the input collections
(currently the needed collection are not stored by the HLT menu --> JIRA ticket https://its.cern.ch/jira/projects/CMSHLT/issues/CMSHLT-1229)

we will probably adjust the amount of plots produced for the HLT monitoring,
but for preparing the proper list I need the help of HCAL experts
(@hatakeyamak , @deguio , @mariadalfonso )

in addition, I added the TopFolderName variable for avoiding to overwrite 
offline and HLT local reco monitoring plots

I would add the GenericTriggerEventFlag in the DQM code
@hatakeyamak do you agree ?
thanks
title: add HLT HCAL DQM/Validation
